name: node-projector
description: Manage your schema & project data to PostgreSQL, Elasticsearch and LevelDB (more can be added) via a simple API

scripts.docs: jsduck --title=node-projector lib/* -o /tmp/projector-docs && git stash && git checkout gh-pages && rsync -av /tmp/projector-docs/ . && git add . && git commit -am 'updating docs' && git push origin gh-pages && git checkout master && git stash apply
